title: When a piece of paper determines everything
description-1: Talking about money remains one of the biggest taboos in Flanders. In Over Geld Gesproken, Frances Lefebure breaks that financial silence. Together with notary Carol Bohyn - known among other things from the VTM program
description-2: Erfgenaam Gezocht - she travels across Flanders to confront families with questions they'd rather postpone than solve. What happens to your house and your savings when your partner passes away? How is everything divided when your parents are no longer around? With clear answers, confronting simulations and surprising eye-openers, Frances and Carol bring order to the financial chaos.
